column4: I was wondering if I had ubuntu and winblows installed and have since gotten rid of the evil one and would like to add that to my main ubuntu partition how would I go about doing this ( hence what app would I use)
I would start gparted, umount the win NTFS partition, format it to ext4 and maybe use it as separate /home Partition, if you have no separate /home until now ;)
